description.zh-cn: 自2010年底开始在阿拉伯世界爆发的一系列以“民主”和“经济”为主题的反政府示威、抗议和武装叛乱的革命浪潮。
description.en: A series of anti-government protests, uprisings, and armed rebellions that spread across much of the Arab world in the early 2010s.

description.zh-cn: 突尼斯前总统，在茉莉花革命中被推翻，结束长达23年的执政。
description.en: Former President of Tunisia, ousted during the Jasmine Revolution, ending his 23-year rule.

nodes.id: 穆罕默德·胡斯尼·穆巴拉克

zh-cn: 穆罕默德·胡斯尼·穆巴拉克

description.zh-cn: 埃及前总统，在2011年埃及革命中被推翻，结束长达30年的统治。
description.en: Former President of Egypt, ousted during the 2011 Egyptian revolution, ending his 30-year rule.

description.zh-cn: 利比亚前领导人，在第一次利比亚内战中被推翻并被杀，结束长达42年的统治。
description.en: Former leader of Libya, overthrown and killed during the First Libyan Civil War, ending his 42-year rule.

nodes.id: 阿卜杜勒-阿齐兹·布特弗利卡

zh-cn: 阿卜杜勒-阿齐兹·布特弗利卡

description.zh-cn: 阿尔及利亚前总统，在2019年全国游行示威后提前下台，结束近20年的总统生涯。
description.en: Former President of Algeria, resigned after nationwide protests in 2019, ending his nearly 20-year presidency.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚前总统，其政权在叙利亚内战后期垮台，随后流亡俄罗斯。
description.en: Former President of Syria, whose regime collapsed in the later stages of the Syrian Civil War, after which he went into exile in Russia.

description.zh-cn: 苏丹前总统，在2019年苏丹政变中被推翻，结束长达30年的统治。
description.en: Former President of Sudan, overthrown in the 2019 Sudanese coup d'état, ending his 30-year rule.

description.zh-cn: 也门前总统，执政33年后在2011年反政府示威中移交权力，后在也门内战中被杀。
description.en: Former President of Yemen, who transferred power after 33 years of rule during the 2011 anti-government protests and was later killed in the Yemeni Civil War.

en: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant

description.zh-cn: 趁阿拉伯之春造成的地区动荡而崛起的极端恐怖组织，曾控制叙利亚和伊拉克的大片区域。
description.en: An extremist terrorist organization that rose to prominence amid the regional instability caused by the Arab Spring, once controlling large areas of Syria and Iraq.

description.zh-cn: 因阿拉伯之春导致的北非和中东地区动荡，大量难民和移民涌入欧洲引发的危机。
description.en: A crisis caused by the large influx of refugees and migrants into Europe due to instability in North Africa and the Middle East following the Arab Spring.

description.zh-cn: 指阿拉伯之春后，多个阿拉伯国家陷入长期动乱、内战和政治不稳定的时期。
description.en: Refers to the period of long-term turmoil, civil war, and political instability that several Arab countries fell into after the Arab Spring.

description.zh-cn: 发生在突尼斯的民众反政府运动，导致本·阿里政权倒台，并引发了阿拉伯之春。
description.en: A popular anti-government movement in Tunisia that led to the fall of Ben Ali's regime and triggered the Arab Spring.

description.zh-cn: 突尼斯年轻小贩，其自焚事件成为茉莉花革命乃至整个阿拉伯之春的导火索。
description.en: A young Tunisian street vendor whose self-immolation was the catalyst for the Jasmine Revolution and the entire Arab Spring.

description.zh-cn: 导致埃及总统穆巴拉克下台的民众反政府运动。
description.en: A popular anti-government movement that led to the resignation of Egyptian President Mubarak.

description.zh-cn: 导致卡扎菲政权倒台并引发多国军事干预的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict that led to the overthrow of the Gaddafi regime and triggered multinational military intervention.

description.zh-cn: 卡扎菲政权倒台后，利比亚各派系之间爆发的武装冲突。
description.en: An armed conflict between various factions in Libya following the overthrow of the Gaddafi regime.

description.zh-cn: 始于反政府示威的长期多方武装冲突，导致阿萨德政权垮台并造成严重的人道主义危机。
description.en: A long-term, multi-sided armed conflict that began with anti-government protests, leading to the collapse of the Assad regime and a severe humanitarian crisis.

description.zh-cn: 也门哈迪政府被推翻后，由胡塞武装与沙特领导的联军等多方参与的持续内战。
description.en: An ongoing civil war involving multiple parties, including the Houthi movement and the Saudi-led coalition, following the overthrow of the Hadi government.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚总统巴沙尔·阿萨德的政府在反对派武装的攻势下垮台的事件。
description.en: The event in which the government of Syrian President Bashar al-Assad collapsed under an offensive by opposition forces.

description.zh-cn: 埃及首位民选总统，后在2013年埃及政变中被军方推翻，最终在法庭上身亡。
description.en: The first democratically elected president of Egypt, who was overthrown by the military in the 2013 Egyptian coup d'état and later died in court.

description.zh-cn: 埃及军方推翻民选总统穆尔西的政变。
description.en: The military coup in Egypt that overthrew the democratically elected President Morsi.

description.zh-cn: 导致苏丹总统巴希尔被推翻的军事政变。
description.en: The military coup that led to the overthrow of Sudanese President Omar al-Bashir.

description.zh-cn: 苏丹武装部队与快速支援部队之间爆发的全国性武装冲突。
description.en: A nationwide armed conflict that broke out between the Sudanese Armed Forces and the Rapid Support Forces.

description.zh-cn: 也门胡塞武装联合萨利赫的支持者推翻哈迪政府的政变。
description.en: The coup in which Houthi forces, allied with supporters of Ali Abdullah Saleh, overthrew the government of Abdrabbuh Mansur Hadi.

nodes.id: 阿卜杜·拉布·曼苏尔·哈迪

zh-cn: 阿卜杜·拉布·曼苏尔·哈迪

description.zh-cn: 也门前总统，在萨利赫下台后接任，后被胡塞武装推翻。
description.en: Former President of Yemen, who took office after Saleh stepped down and was later overthrown by Houthi forces.

description.zh-cn: 也门的什叶派政治和武装组织，在也门内战中扮演关键角色。
description.en: A Shia political and armed organization in Yemen that plays a key role in the Yemeni Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 西亚国家，在阿拉伯之春后的地区冲突中扮演重要角色，如军事干预也门。
description.en: A country in Western Asia that has played a significant role in regional conflicts following the Arab Spring, such as its military intervention in Yemen.

nodes.id: 沙特领导的干预也门行动

zh-cn: 沙特领导的干预也门行动

description.zh-cn: 沙特阿拉伯领导的多个逊尼派国家联军对也门胡塞武装展开的军事干预行动。
description.en: A military intervention in Yemen by a coalition of several Sunni Muslim countries led by Saudi Arabia against the Houthi movement.

description.zh-cn: 在叙利亚内战中支持阿萨德政府，并在其政权垮台后为其提供庇护。
description.en: Supported the Assad government during the Syrian Civil War and provided asylum to Assad after his regime's collapse.

description.zh-cn: 利比亚反对派在第一次利比亚内战期间成立的临时政府机构，成功推翻了卡扎菲政权。
description.en: The interim governing body established by opposition forces during the First Libyan Civil War, which successfully overthrew the Gaddafi regime.

description.zh-cn: 联合国安理会通过的决议，授权在利比亚设立禁飞区并采取“一切必要措施”保护平民，为多国军事干预提供了法律依据。
description.en: A resolution passed by the UN Security Council authorizing a no-fly zone over Libya and taking "all necessary measures" to protect civilians, providing a legal basis for multinational military intervention.

description.zh-cn: 参与了对利比亚的军事干预行动。
description.en: Participated in the military intervention in Libya.

description.zh-cn: 率先参与了对利比亚的军事干预行动。
description.en: Took a leading role in the military intervention in Libya.

description.zh-cn: 参与了对利比亚的军事干预行动。
description.en: Participated in the military intervention in Libya.

nodes.id: 海湾阿拉伯国家合作委员会

zh-cn: 海湾阿拉伯国家合作委员会

description.zh-cn: 由海湾六国组成的区域性组织，在阿拉伯之春期间介入了巴林和也门的局势。
description.en: A regional organization comprising six Gulf states that intervened in the situations in Bahrain and Yemen during the Arab Spring.

description.zh-cn: 西亚岛国，在阿拉伯之春期间爆发了大规模反政府示威，后在海合会干预下平息。
description.en: An island country in Western Asia that experienced large-scale anti-government protests during the Arab Spring, which were suppressed with the intervention of the GCC.

description.zh-cn: 2011年在美国纽约爆发的抗议运动，受阿拉伯之春影响，抗议社会不公和经济不平等。
description.en: A protest movement that began in New York City in 2011, influenced by the Arab Spring, protesting social and economic inequality.

description.zh-cn: 其自焚事件是茉莉花革命的直接导火索。
description.en: His self-immolation was the direct catalyst for the Jasmine Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 突尼斯的茉莉花革命是阿拉伯之春浪潮的开端。
description.en: The Jasmine Revolution in Tunisia was the beginning of the Arab Spring wave.

description.zh-cn: 导致其政权被推翻并流亡海外。
description.en: Led to the overthrow of his regime and his exile.

relationships.target: 穆罕默德·胡斯尼·穆巴拉克

description.zh-cn: 导致其政权被推翻并被捕入狱。
description.en: Led to the overthrow of his regime and his imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 在其引发的内战中被杀。
description.en: Was killed in the civil war it triggered.

description.zh-cn: 导致其移交权力，后在内战中被杀。
description.en: Led to his transfer of power, and he was later killed in the civil war.

relationships.target: 阿卜杜勒-阿齐兹·布特弗利卡

description.zh-cn: 导致其被迫辞职。
description.en: Led to his forced resignation.

description.zh-cn: 导致其在军事政变中被推翻。
description.en: Led to his overthrow in a military coup.

description.zh-cn: 在其引发的内战中政权最终垮台。
description.en: His regime ultimately collapsed in the civil war it triggered.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯之春之后，多个国家陷入长期动乱，被称为阿拉伯之冬。
description.en: After the Arab Spring, several countries fell into prolonged turmoil, known as the Arab Winter.

description.zh-cn: 极端组织伊斯兰国趁阿拉伯之春造成的乱局崛起。
description.en: The extremist organization ISIS rose to prominence amidst the chaos caused by the Arab Spring.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯之春引发的地区动荡是欧洲移民危机的主要原因之一。
description.en: The regional instability triggered by the Arab Spring was a major cause of the European migrant crisis.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯之春运动影响并启发了在阿拉伯世界以外地区的抗议活动，例如美国的占领华尔街运动。
description.en: The Arab Spring movement influenced and inspired protest activities outside the Arab world, such as the Occupy Wall Street movement in the United States.

relationships.target: 穆罕默德·胡斯尼·穆巴拉克

description.zh-cn: 民众示威浪潮迫使穆巴拉克辞去总统职务。
description.en: The wave of popular protests forced Mubarak to resign from the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 埃及军方发动政变，逮捕并罢免了总统穆尔西。
description.en: The Egyptian military launched a coup, arresting and removing President Morsi.

description.zh-cn: 卡扎菲在内战中被全国过渡委员会的部队杀死。
description.en: Gaddafi was killed by National Transitional Council forces during the civil war.

description.zh-cn: 作为反对派成立的临时政府，领导了推翻卡扎菲政权的武装斗争。
description.en: As the interim government formed by the opposition, it led the armed struggle to overthrow the Gaddafi regime.

description.zh-cn: 该决议为多国军事干预利比亚提供了法律依据，以保护平民。
description.en: This resolution provided the legal basis for multinational military intervention in Libya to protect civilians.

description.zh-cn: 作为多国联盟的一部分，参与轰炸亲卡扎菲部队。
description.en: As part of a multinational coalition, participated in the bombing of pro-Gaddafi forces.

description.zh-cn: 作为多国联盟的一部分，率先参与轰炸亲卡扎菲部队。
description.en: As part of a multinational coalition, took a leading role in bombing pro-Gaddafi forces.

description.zh-cn: 作为多国联盟的一部分，参与轰炸亲卡扎菲部队。
description.en: As part of a multinational coalition, participated in the bombing of pro-Gaddafi forces.

description.zh-cn: 长达十余年的内战最终导致了阿萨德政权的垮台。
description.en: The decade-long civil war ultimately led to the collapse of the Assad regime.

description.zh-cn: 阿萨德政权垮台后，巴沙尔·阿萨德携家人流亡至俄罗斯莫斯科。
description.en: After the collapse of the Assad regime, Bashar al-Assad and his family went into exile in Moscow, Russia.

relationships.target: 阿卜杜·拉布·曼苏尔·哈迪

description.zh-cn: 发动政变推翻哈迪政府，并成立临时政府。
description.en: Launched a coup to overthrow the Hadi government and established an interim government.

description.zh-cn: 在其改变立场后将其杀害。
description.en: Killed him after he switched allegiances.

relationships.source: 沙特领导的干预也门行动

description.zh-cn: 沙特领导的多国联军对也门胡塞武装展开军事打击。
description.en: The Saudi-led multinational coalition launched military strikes against the Houthi movement in Yemen.

relationships.source: 海湾阿拉伯国家合作委员会

description.zh-cn: 应巴林政府邀请，派遣军警进驻巴林协助平息内乱。
description.en: At the invitation of the Bahraini government, sent military and police forces to Bahrain to help quell the unrest.
